name: sound-stack
title: Sound Stack
description: Manage audio device priority and automatically switch to your preferred devices when they connect.
author: bailey_jennings

commands.name: priority-list
commands.title: List Devices
commands.subtitle: Sound Stack
commands.description: View and reorder your audio input and output devices by priority.

commands.name: priority-monitor
commands.title: Priority Monitor (background)
commands.subtitle: Sound Stack
commands.description: Background service that automatically switches to highest priority devices when they connect or disconnect.

preferences.name: monitorInterval
preferences.title: Background Monitoring Interval
preferences.description: How often to check for audio device changes in the background. Lower values are more responsive but use more system resources.

commands.name: priority-refresh
commands.title: Switch to Priority Devices
commands.subtitle: Sound Stack
commands.description: Check and switch to highest priority audio devices. Works independently of background monitoring.

preferences.name: systemOutput
preferences.title: Also switch system sound effects
preferences.description: When switching output devices, also change where system alert sounds and notification beeps play. Most users want this enabled.
preferences.label: Switch system sounds with output device

preferences.name: enableAutoSwitch
preferences.title: Enable Automatic Priority Switching
preferences.description: Automatically switch to the highest priority available device when audio devices connect or disconnect. Use 'Switch to Priority Devices' command for immediate manual switching.
preferences.label: Enable automatic switching

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
